content.query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS DimCustomer;
GO

 

CREATE VIEW DimCustomer AS
SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/advworks/Customer',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'SqlOnDemandMI',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) 
  AS [Customer]; 

SELECT * FROM DimCustomer  



DROP VIEW IF EXISTS DimCustomer;
GO

 

CREATE VIEW DimAddress AS
SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/advworks/Address',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'SqlOnDemandMI',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) 
  AS [Address]; 

SELECT * FROM DimAddress  


CREATE VIEW DimCustomerAddress AS
SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/advworks/CustomerAddress',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'SqlOnDemandMI',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) 
  AS [CustomerAddress]; 

SELECT * FROM DimCustomerAddress  

CREATE VIEW FactSalesOrderDetail AS
SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/advworks/SalesOrderDetail',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'SqlOnDemandMI',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) 
  AS [SalesOrderDetail]; 

SELECT * FROM FactSalesOrderDetail  


CREATE VIEW FactSalesOrderHeader AS
SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/advworks/SalesOrderHeader',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'SqlOnDemandMI',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) 
  AS [SalesOrderHeader]; 

SELECT * FROM FactSalesOrderHeader
